description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) named JoinRequest used for handling join room requests in the backend of a game application. It contains fields for the user's name and preferred color, along with getter and setter methods.

classes.name: JoinRequest
classes.description: A DTO representing a request to join a game room, containing user name and optional preferred color.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the user attempting to join.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name for the join request.

methods.name: getPreferredColor
methods.description: Returns the preferred color specified in the join request.

methods.name: setPreferredColor
methods.description: Sets the preferred color for the join request.
